alert.note: Alert for Bay; Holmes; Walton; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 16 at 10:04AM EDT until June 16 at 11:00AM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Dale County in southeastern Alabama... Coffee County in southeastern Alabama... Geneva County in southeastern Alabama... Western Houston County in southeastern Alabama... Northern Bay County in the Panhandle of Florida... Walton County in the Panhandle of Florida... Holmes County in the Panhandle of Florida... Washington County in the Panhandle of Florida... * Until 1000 AM CDT. * At 904 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Fort Deposit to near Baker to near Pensacola Beach, moving east at 65 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Panama City Beach, Daleville, Elba, Vernon, Bonifay, Geneva, Fort Rucker, Ozark, Santa Rosa Beach, De Funiak Springs, Enterprise, Chipley, Dothan, Hartford, Taylor, Midland City, Level Plains, Slocomb, Samson and Newton. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
